mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(userid, userpw, userpwd, username, birthdate , email, gender, pnumber) values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{userpwd}, #{username}, #{birthdate}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{pnumber})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member order by userid
